■How to implement “Read more” in CMS website functionality

I am currently contracted to build a membership website. On the website, I am considering implementing a feature that allows the first few paragraphs of an article to be viewed for free, but requires membership registration after reading some portion of the article, i.e., a “read more” button.
I am finding it difficult to achieve the ideal situation by simply using “Private - Registration Required”, but if you have any ideas or references, I would appreciate it if you could share them.

You could try something like that:
In the module check with Hubl if the user is registered, if not, truncate the text by X characters and show the "Read more" button that redirects you to the registration page, else show everything
Thanks for the very interesting information. I hadn’t thought of that way and will try it.
